titles.title: A bill to amend title 11 of the United States Code to provide that the trustee may not avoid certain transfers made to depositors by uninsured industrial banks that are debtors.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Monopolies and Commercial Law.

bill.summary: 6/16/1987--Introduced. Amends Federal bankruptcy provisions to provide that a bankruptcy trustee may not avoid transfers made to depositors by uninsured industrial banks that accept and issue documentary evidence of time and savings deposits in the ordinary course of business. Specifies that such a requirement shall take effect retroactive to March 8, 1983, but shall not apply to bankruptcy cases filed before that date.
